## Calculate harmonic mean of K in each direction based on T-ProGS

```{r}
# k1 <- sand
# k2 <- silt
# k3 <- clay
k1 <- 7*10^-5
k2 <- 2*10^-7
k3 <- 4*10^-8

# p values are proportions of each facies from T-ProGS
p1 <- .275
p2 <- .114
p3 <- .611

Kx <- (k1*p1 + k2*p2 + k3*p3)/3 # normal average
Ky <- Kx
Kz <- 3/((1/(k1*pi))+(1/(k2*p2))+ (1/(k3*p3))) # harmonic
```
